name: Giveback
description: A comprehensive platform connecting donors with meaningful causes, facilitating transparent charitable giving, and building stronger communities through technology-driven philanthropy.

responsibilities: Designed and developed complete donation processing system with Stripe integration
Built real-time impact tracking dashboard with live donation analytics
Implemented charity verification system with admin approval workflow
Created responsive UI/UX with Tailwind CSS and Next.js
Deployed and configured production environment on Vercel

features: Secure Donation Processing with Stripe integration
Real-time Impact Tracking with live donation updates
Community Engagement Tools for donor interaction
Charity Verification System with admin approval
Donation Analytics Dashboard with detailed insights

metrics: Processing $50K+ in donations within first month
Sub-2s page load times optimized with Next.js
highlights: Built scalable database architecture with Prisma
